meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>condition</kanji> that something is in and the <kanji>appearance</kanji> of it is the <vocabulary>condition</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>state</vocabulary> of that object.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
